subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Soccer
Television
lead_paragraph: Fox Sports plans to broadcast the group stage of the UEFA Champions League with Multimatch 90, a channel similar to NFL RedZone that will show up to eight games at a time.
snippet: Fox Sports plans to broadcast the group stage of the UEFA Champions League with Multimatch 90, a channel similar to NFL RedZone that will show up to eight games at a time.
